instructionSteps.title: 1. Create ARM Resources and Provide the Required Permissions
instructionSteps.description: We will create data collection rule (DCR) and data collection endpoint (DCE) resources. We will also create a Microsoft Entra app registration and assign the required permissions to it.

parameters.content:
#### Automated deployment of Azure resources
Clicking on "Deploy push connector resources" will trigger the creation of DCR and DCE resources.
It will then create a Microsoft Entra app registration with client secret and grant permissions on the DCR. This setup enables data to be sent securely to the DCR using a OAuth v2 client credentials.

parameters.label: Deploy push connector resources
parameters.applicationDisplayName: Onapsis Defend Integration push to Microsoft Sentinel

instructionSteps.title: 2. Maintain the data collection endpoint details and authentication info in Onapsis Defend Integration
instructionSteps.description:
Share the data collection endpoint URL and authentication info with the Onapsis Defend Integration administrator to configure the Onapsis Defend Integration to send data to the data collection endpoint.

Learn more from [this blog series](https://community.Onapsis.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-blog-posts-by-members/ultimate-blog-series-Onapsis-logserv-integration-with-microsoft-sentinel/ba-p/14126401).
